name: Colin Jackson
slug: No single image more powerfully redefined Welsh identity for the 1990s than that of a triumphant Colin proudly draped in Y Ddraig Goch (the National Flag of Wales).

name: Iris Williams
slug: Despite any difficulties Iris Williams suffered at the start of her life, she showed great strength of character to become an international singing star.

name: Paul Robeson
slug: Paul Robeson was blessed with a wonderful singing voice.  He was also fiercely moral – and believed in treating people, whatever their creed and skin colour, with respect and fairness.

name: Louisa St Bartholomew-Brown Morgan
slug: Louisa has lived an interesting life – believing that a person can grow and improve through hard work, travelling the world and having strong faith.

name: Clive Sullivan
slug: Clive Sullivan was the first black person to captain a British national sports side.

name: John Ystumllyn
slug: John Ystumllyn – who is also known by the names Jack Du or Jack Black – was a gardener in the 18th century.

name: Tiger Bay
slug: Tiger Bay is one of the UK’s oldest multi-ethnic communities.
